text:
@kaitlancollins That 2nd part is dead on. His covid19 response DOES speak for itself.

 Most covid19 deaths anywhere
Most covid19 cases anywhere
Only major country that failed to flatten the curve 
Only person who touted an unproven drug
Only person who said injection of bleach may help

FAILURE

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
